pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fitting Finite Mixture of Scale Mixture of Skew-Normal Distributions // Functions to fit finite mixture of scale mixture of skew-normal (FM-SMSN) distributions, details in Prates, Lachos and Cabral (2013) doi: 10.18637/jss.v054.i12, Cabral, Lachos and Prates (2012) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2011.06.026 and Basso, Lachos, Cabral and Ghosh (2010) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2009.09.031.
